attributes.title: Welcome to the Painstation
attributes.caption: Returning champ Alfredo Diaz must defend his title against 5 new competitors as they vie for a chance at the entire Monopoly bank, worth $20,580.
attributes.description: Returning champ Alfredo Diaz must defend his title against 5 new competitors as they vie for a chance at the entire Monopoly bank, worth $20,580.

attributes.title: Deals and Doubles
attributes.caption: With alliances forming and properties disappearing, the players must work quickly to secure themselves.
attributes.description: With alliances forming and properties disappearing, the players must work quickly to secure themselves.

attributes.title: Front Stabbing
attributes.caption: Alliances are put to the test as the competition becomes more intense with every roll.
attributes.description: Alliances are put to the test as the competition becomes more intense with every roll.

attributes.title: Mind Games
attributes.caption: The board becomes increasingly more dangerous and jail starts to look very appealing to the players as they avoid growing monopolies.
attributes.description: The board becomes increasingly more dangerous and jail starts to look very appealing to the players as they avoid growing monopolies.

attributes.title: Against the Ropes
attributes.caption: With one player eliminated, the remaining competitors must fight harder than ever to survive expensive payouts.
attributes.description: With one player eliminated, the remaining competitors must fight harder than ever to survive expensive payouts.

attributes.title: Crass Capitalism
attributes.caption: With only 3 competitors remaining and dangerously high payouts at every turn, the players must fight to stay alive.
attributes.description: With only 3 competitors remaining and dangerously high payouts at every turn, the players must fight to stay alive.

attributes.title: Deadly Doubles
attributes.caption: Without allies to help them, the final two competitors go all in as they battle for cash and bragging rights -- who will emerge as the victor of Hardcore Tabletop: World Series?
attributes.description: Without allies to help them, the final two competitors go all in as they battle for cash and bragging rights -- who will emerge as the victor of Hardcore Tabletop: World Series?
